payload.reason: [from insight/dag] ins-1uy complete: Created storage modules in apps/insight-mobile/src/storage/ - goals.ts, projects.ts, people.ts, places.ts with Supabase sync. Also created supabase/client.ts and helpers.ts.

[from insight/dag] ins-mcm complete: Created Tasks screens with filters and Kanban board view.

- app/(tabs)/tasks.tsx - Task list with inbox/today/next7/all/done filters, quick-add with #tags, XP display

- src/storage/tasks.ts - Task CRUD with Supabase sync
- src/state/theme.tsx - Theme provider (dark/light)
- src/utils/points.ts - XP calculation
- components/Themed.tsx - Themed Text/View components

[from insight/dag] ins-4kb complete: Created Calendar views with Day/Week/Month toggle and Agenda view.

Created:
- app/(tabs)/calendar.tsx - Main calendar with Day/Week/Month view toggle, navigation (prev/next/today)
- app/agenda.tsx - List agenda view grouped by day with time/duration display

Components:
- src/components/calendar/DayView.tsx - Hourly timeline with event blocks
- src/components/calendar/WeekView.tsx - 7-day grid with event positioning
- src/components/calendar/MonthView.tsx - Monthly grid with event counts and points intensity

Supporting:
- src/storage/events.ts - CalendarEvent CRUD with Supabase sync

[from insight/dag] ins-ub3 complete: Created Settings screen with all requested sections.

Supporting:

[from insight/dag] Completed bead ins-16u (Notes/Inbox). [from insight/dag] Completed bead ins-uui (People/Places). [from insight/dag] Completed bead ins-vor (Timeline/Tiimo Day). Both follow desktop patterns adapted for mobile.
